Literature.Title: Biosynthetic Interrogation of Soil Metagenomes Reveals Metamarin, an Uncommon Cyclomarin Congener with Activity against Mycobacterium tuberculosis
Literature.Author: Li L, MacIntyre LW, Ali T, Russo R, Koirala B, Hernandez Y, Brady SF

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Murine macrophage cells J774A.1:50% Cell death=0.71 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=0.16µg/ml),Mycobacterium tuberculosis(MIC=0.08-0.63µg/ml),Mycobacterium smegmatis mc2-155(MIC=16µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus NRRL B-1018(MIC=8µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis 168(MIC=>128µg/ml),Enterococcus faecium Com15(MIC=>128µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus USA 300(MIC=>128µg/ml),Escherichia coli DH5alpha(MIC=>128µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 17978(MIC=>128µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>128µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 10031(MIC=>128µg/ml),Candida albicans(MIC=>128µg/ml)
